newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks mixed, Riviera thrusts forward.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks mixed, Riviera thrusts forward.

text.p: Croatian stocks closed mixed on Friday in lacklustre activity, with hotelier Riviera thrusting forward on the day's record volume.
* Five of 14 traded issues rose, five fell and four were flat.
* Riviera, up 6.45 percent to 165 kuna, was the top gainer and most active issue with 1,965 shares traded.
* Fully-listed Zagrebacka Banka ordinaries rose 20 kuna or 0.99 percent to end at 2,050 kuna on volume of 313.
* Drugs firm Pliva lost two kuna or 0.44 percent to 448 on volume of 153 units. -- Zagreb Newsroom, 385-1-4557075
